resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81757</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81757</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4583</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Postcards</string>
            <string language="es">Tarjetas postales</string>
            <string language="ga">Cártaí Poist</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Postkarten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cartes postales</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Postcards</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cartoline</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάρτες</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Printable worksheet that requires students to write simple postcards. It can be expanded as pupils' confidence grows.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de trabajo que se puede imprimir y que requiere que los estudiantes escriban tarjetas postales sencillas. Puede ampliarse cuando los alumnos ganen más confianza.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog oibre inphriontáilte ina scríobhann daltaí cártaí poist simplí. Is féidir é a leathnú nuair a fhásann misneach na ndaltaí.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">French</string>
            <string language="es">Francés. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Fraincis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bedruckbarer Bogen, der Kursteilnehmer benötigt,
einfache Postkarten zu schreiben. Er kann als Vertrauen der 
Pupillen erweitert werden wächst.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau imprimable qui exige des étudiants 
d'écrire les cartes postales simples. Il peut être augmenté 
comme confiance des pupilles se développe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha printable que requer estudantes escrever 
postcards simples. Pode ser expandida como a confiança das 
pupilas cresce.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro stampabile che richiede agli 
allievi di scrivere le cartoline semplici. Può essere espanso 
come riservatezza delle pupille si sviluppa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκτυπώσιμο φύλλο εργασίας που απαιτεί τους σπουδαστές
για να γράψει τις απλές κάρτες. Μπορεί να επεκταθεί καθώς 
η εμπιστοσύνη των μαθητών αυξάνεται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Französisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Français</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Francês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Francese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γαλλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>

          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>

        <classification>
